doc:
Corey Allen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corey_Allen 0 Corey Allen (June 29, 1934 – June 27, 2010) was an American film and television director, writer, producer, and actor. He began his career as an actor but eventually became a television director. He may be best known for playing the character Buzz Gunderson in Nicholas Ray's Rebel Without a Cause (1955). Corey_Allen ( June_29_,_1934 – June_27_,_2010 ) was an_American_film_and_television_director , writer , producer , and actor . He began his_career as an_actor but eventually_became a_television_director . He may_be_best_known for playing the_character_Buzz_Gunderson in Nicholas_Ray 's_Rebel Without a_Cause_(_1955_) .
